title: The Best of Britain
creator_credit: Moviemaker Film and Television Production Co
brief_description: The Best of Britain takes you to nine of Britain’s most beautiful cities and towns. It is a detailed and colourful record of these historic places of interest, which represent a unique heritage and reflect the distinctive ambience which can only be described as the best of Britain. Rated: G
